title: Epstein files: Ex-UK ambassador to U.S. Peter Mandelson released on bail after arrest
summary_full: Mandelson's arrest came days after police arrested Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor, brother of King Charles III, on suspicion of misconduct in public office.
summary_public: Mandelson's arrest came days after police arrested Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor, brother of King Charles III, on suspicion of misconduct in public office.
